headline: Formula One Group Extends Concorde Deal And Adds MotoGP For Growth
summary: Formula One Group (NasdaqGS:FWON.K) has agreed a new Concorde Agreement running through 2030. The company has expanded its media rights partnerships, including a new deal with Apple in the U.S. Formula One Group has acquired MotoGP, adding another major global motorsport property to its portfolio. headline: Apple’s Houston Manufacturing Push Ties AI Servers To Supply Resilience
summary: Apple (NasdaqGS:AAPL) announced a major expansion of its U.S. manufacturing footprint, including Mac mini production and advanced AI server assembly in Houston. The company is establishing a new Advanced Manufacturing Center in Houston focused on building American manufacturing expertise and workforce skills. Apple plans to source chips and components from U.S. partners as part of this broader effort to adjust its supply chain and production base. For investors watching NasdaqGS:AAPL, this...

headline: TSMC’s US$2t Milestone And Apple Deal Reshape Chip Investment Case
summary: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing (NYSE:TSM) has reached a market capitalization of about US$2t, placing it among the most highly valued companies globally. The company is deepening its role as a key supplier to major technology firms, including a significant order from Apple for advanced chips. Apple's order is tied to chips planned for production at TSMC's Arizona facility in the U.S., highlighting an increased focus on domestically produced semiconductors. Taiwan Semiconductor...
